boot_profile_log.php

00001 <?php
00002 /**
00003  * include this file inside your config.php to get a profiling-overview of your webapp.
00004  * note: you need the xdebug extension
00005  * 
00006  * set PROFILE_LOG_MINIMUM in config if you don't need methods lasting shorter than this value
00007  *
00008  * @author mnt@codeninja.de, jo@wurzelpilz.de
00009  * @package kata_debugging
00010  *
00011  * Kata - Lightweight MVC Framework <http://www.codeninja.de/>
00012  * Copyright 2007-2009 mnt@codeninja.de, gameforge ag
00013  *
00014  * Licensed under The GPL License
00015  * Redistributions of files must retain the above copyright notice.
00016  */
00017 
00018     if (function_exists('xdebug_start_trace')) {
00019 
00020 /**
00021  * shutdown function to generate profile report 
00022  */
00023         function kataSmallProfile() {
00024             xdebug_stop_trace();
00025             $lines = file($GLOBALS['kataSmallProfileFile'] . '.xt');
00026             unlink($GLOBALS['kataSmallProfileFile'] . '.xt');
00027 
00028             array_shift($lines);//version
00029             array_shift($lines);//trace start
00030             array_pop($lines);//exit
00031             array_pop($lines);//trace end
00032             $lastLine = array_pop($lines);//dummy
00033 
00034             $temp = explode("\t",$lines[2]);
00035             $endTime = $temp[3];
00036             $temp = explode("\t",$lastLine);
00037             $totalTime = $temp[3]-$endTime;
00038             unset($temp);
00039 
00040             $callStack = array ();
00041             $outCnt = array();
00042             $out = array ();
00043 
00044             foreach ($lines as $line) {
00045                 $line = explode("\t", $line);
00046 
00047                 if (1 == $line[2]) {
00048                     $retLine = array_pop($callStack);
00049                     if ($retLine[6] == 1) { //user func
00050                         $time = $line[3] - $retLine[3];
00051                         $outCnt[$retLine[5]] = (empty($outCnt[$retLine[5]])?0:$outCnt[$retLine[5]])+1;
00052                         $out[$retLine[5]] = (empty ($out[$retLine[5]]) ? 0 : $out[$retLine[5]]) + $time;
00053                     }
00054                     continue;
00055                 }
00056 
00057                 if (substr($line[8], 0, strlen(ROOT)) != ROOT) {
00058                     continue;
00059                 }
00060 
00061                 if (0 == $line[2]) { // entry
00062                     $callStack[] = $line;
00063                 }
00064             }
00065             arsort($out);
00066             
00067             // if PROFILE_LOG_MINIMUM is defined, only log request with a minimum runtime (in s)
00068             $logMinimum = (defined('PROFILE_LOG_MINIMUM') ? PROFILE_LOG_MINIMUM : 0);
00069             
00070 
00071             $log = '';
00072             $timePerBlock = ($totalTime/50);
00073             foreach ($out as $n=>$v) {
00074                 // ignore dispatcher...
00075                 if ($n == 'dispatcher->dispatch' || $n == 'require') {
00076                     continue;
00077                 }
00078                 if ($v >= $logMinimum) {
00079                     $sl = strlen($n);
00080                     $tTimes = max(1, 6 - (int)($sl/8));
00081                     $log .= $outCnt[$n]."\t".$n;
00082                     for ($i=0; $i<$tTimes; $i++) {
00083                         $log .= "\t";
00084                     }
00085                     $log .= number_format($v,3)."s ";
00086                     $dl = '';
00087                     for ($i=0; $i<(int)($v/$timePerBlock); $i++) {
00088                         //$dl .= chr(0xDB);
00089                         if ($i % 10 == 9) {
00090                             $dl.='|';   
00091                         }
00092                         $dl .= '~';
00093                     }
00094                     if (!empty($dl)) {
00095                         $log .= $dl;
00096                     }
00097                     
00098                     $log .= "\n";
00099                 }
00100             }
00101             if (!empty($log)) {
00102                 $log = "===============================================================\n".
00103                 date("d.m. H:i:s")."\n".$_SERVER['REQUEST_URI']."\nTotal: ".$totalTime."s".
00104                 "\n---------------------------------------------------------------\n".
00105                 $log.
00106                 "===============================================================\n\n";
00107                 file_put_contents($GLOBALS['kataProfileLogFile'], $log, FILE_APPEND);
00108             }
00109         }
00110 
00111         register_shutdown_function('kataSmallProfile');
00112         if (!defined('KATATMP')) {
00113             $GLOBALS['kataSmallProfileFile'] = ROOT.'tmp'.DS. 'trace' . rand(0, PHP_INT_MAX);
00114             $GLOBALS['kataProfileLogFile'] = ROOT.'tmp'.DS.'logtrace.log';
00115         } else {
00116             $GLOBALS['kataSmallProfileFile'] = KATATMP . 'trace' . rand(0, PHP_INT_MAX);
00117             $GLOBALS['kataProfileLogFile'] = KATATMP.'logtrace.log';
00118         }
00119         ini_set('xdebug.trace_format', 1);
00120         xdebug_start_trace($GLOBALS['kataSmallProfileFile']);
00121 
00122     } else {
00123         file_put_contents($GLOBALS['kataProfileLogFile'], 'You need a current XDebug-Extension!', FILE_APPEND);
00124     }
